mapper.sql: code, p_name, m_code, p_ap, p_os, p_cpu, p_ram, p_capacity, p_battery
mapper.select: select ROWNUM, GUBUN, e.code, m_name as emp, name, cpu, os, ram, pannel, shape, m_code, ma_name as manufacture from equipmentView e left outer join member mem on mem.code = e.code left outer join manufacture ma on ma.ma_code = e.m_code where 1=1 and m_name like '%' || upper(#{m_name}) || '%' or m_name like '%' || lower(#{m_name}) || '%' and ma_name like '%' || upper(#{ma_name}) || '%' or ma_name like '%' || lower(#{ma_name}) || '%' and name like '%' || upper(#{name}) || '%' or name like '%' || lower(#{name}) || '%' and gubun like '%' || upper(#{gubun}) || '%' or gubun like '%' || lower(#{gubun}) || '%'
mapper.update: update phone set p_ap = #{p_ap}, p_os = #{p_os}, p_cpu = #{p_cpu}, p_ram = #{p_ram}, p_capacity = #{p_capacity}, p_battery = #{p_battery}, p_name = #{p_name} where code = #{code}
update phone set pc_gpu = #{p_gpu}, pc_os = #{p_os}, pc_cpu = #{p_cpu}, pc_ram = #{p_ram}, pc_capacity = #{p_capacity}, pc_name = #{p_name} where code = #{code}
update phone set mo_pannel = #{mo_pannel}, mo_hz = #{mo_hz}, mo_resolution = #{mo_resolution}, mo_speed = #{mo_speed}, mo_shape = #{mo_shape}, mo_name = #{mo_name} where code = #{code}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM phone WHERE CODE = #{code} AND M_CODE = #{m_code}
DELETE FROM pc WHERE CODE = #{code} AND M_CODE = #{m_code}
DELETE FROM monitor WHERE CODE = #{code} AND M_CODE = #{m_code}
